name: Cleaning Diver
description:
Cleaning Diver is a relaxing mini game about going underwater deeper and deeper in order to find and recollect toxic waste.

Objective

The goal is to find 10 toxic barrels, placed across the bottom of the ocean.

You can use your flashlight to search for them more easily. 

Also, if you see a greenish trail, there is probably a barrel nearby.

How to play

- Your character dives down slowly.

- You can move to certain direction using Left Mouse Button.

- You can switch on your flashlight holding Right Mouse Button.

- You can recover a barrel by holding down a few seconds the left mouse button on top of it. (if it turns out green, is going ok)
